# What is this repo?

This git repository is used a *[Crev](https://github.com/dpc/crev) Proof Repository*.

It contains *Proofs* published by it's owner:

* package and code reviews
* trust relationships with other Crev users

Any Crev user can import and subscribe to this repository.

Depending on the exact frontend you're using the command might be different.

For [Rust/crates.io ecosystem - `cargo crev`](https://github.com/dpc/crev/tree/master/cargo-crev) try:


```
cargo crev fetch url <full_url_of_this_repository>
```

In case of problems, try asking for help on [crev's gitter channel](https://gitter.im/dpc/crev).
